p: Figure 4 shows output of a transmission history reconstruction of a previously published HIV transmission cluster [ 40]. The cluster includes 8 MSM in Stockholm (sampled between 2002 and 2010) that were believed to have infected one another based on relatively close genetic distances between their HIV sequences. Figure 5 shows the reconstructed transmission history under a different set of assumptions and using different levels of data. Figure 6 shows the estimated number of persons that were involved in the transmission cluster.
